label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_009
content:
## 2026-01-11 Daily Operations Summary

### Metrics
- Zone Transfers
  - AXFR Requests: 52
  - AXFR Success Percentage: 94.2
  - IXFR Requests: 230
  - IXFR Success Percentage: 97.4
  - Transfer Average (ms): 820
  - Transfer P95 (ms): 2100
  - TSIG Failures: 4
- TTL Changes
  - Records Changed: 83
  - Zones Touched: 10
  - TTL Minimum (s): 60
  - TTL Maximum (s): 86400
  - TTL Median (s): 900
  - Rollbacks: 1
- Propagation
  - Cloud Edge Sites: 35
  - Propagation Average (s): 120
  - Propagation P95 (s): 320
  - Stale Answer Percentage: 1.6
- DNS Queries
  - QPS Average: 22000
  - QPS Peak: 52200
  - NX Domain Percentage: 2.4
  - SERVFAIL Percentage: 0.16
  - UDP Percentage: 95.3
  - TCP Fallback Percentage: 2.8
- DNSSEC
  - Zones Signed: 62
  - Signing Queue Depth: 7
  - Signature Refreshes: 149
  - DS Mismatch Count: 0
  - Bogus Validation Events: 6
- Health Checks
  - Authoritative Reachability Percentage: 99.92
  - SOA Serial Mismatch Count: 7
  - Lame Delegation Count: 1
- Change Management
  - Change Requests: 8
  - Changes Applied: 6
  - Changes Failed: 2
  - Mean Time to Apply (min): 41
- Cache Behavior
  - Resolver Cache Hit Percentage: 85.7
  - Negative Cache Hit Percentage: 45.0
  - Prefetch Enabled Percentage: 72.0
- Latency
  - Auth Response Average (ms): 24.3
  - Auth Response P95 (ms): 69.0
  - EDNS0 Present Percentage: 71.0
- Errors
  - Format Error Count: 21
  - Refused Count: 51
  - Rate Limited Count: 40
  - Truncation TC Percentage: 1.5
- Capacity
  - Zones Total: 576
  - Records Total: 2039000
  - Dynamic Updates Per Hour: 410
- Compliance
  - Zonefile Lint Errors: 9
  - DNSSEC Policy Violations: 1
  - Audit Log Gaps: 0

### Infrastructure
- Bind-Master-01
  - CPU Percentage: 58
  - Memory Percentage: 72
  - Disk Used Percentage: 74
  - Network In (Mbps): 140
  - Network Out (Mbps): 190
  - Open Files: 1560
  - NTP Offset (ms): 3
- Bind-Slave-02
  - CPU Percentage: 45
  - Memory Percentage: 66
  - Disk Used Percentage: 56
  - Network In (Mbps): 120
  - Network Out (Mbps): 135
  - Open Files: 1422
  - NTP Offset (ms): 3
- Cloud-DNS-Sync-01
  - CPU Percentage: 83
  - Memory Percentage: 86
  - Disk Used Percentage: 50
  - Network In (Mbps): 170
  - Network Out (Mbps): 210
  - Queue Depth: 18
  - NTP Offset (ms): 2
- Signer-01
  - CPU Percentage: 66
  - Memory Percentage: 85
  - Disk Used Percentage: 61
  - Network In (Mbps): 28
  - Network Out (Mbps): 32
  - HSM Slot Utilization Percentage: 70
  - NTP Offset (ms): 2

### Events
- High-volume dynamic updates from internal tooling increased IXFR churn; sync controller queue depth peaked at 18 and propagation P95 rose above 300s.
- TSIG failures observed on transfers for a subset of newly migrated zones; traced to inconsistent key algorithm setting (hmac-sha256 vs hmac-sha512) between master and cloud.
- Emergency change: temporarily raised minimum TTL from 60 to 300 on frequently updated records to reduce churn; one rollback where short TTL was contractually required.
- Signer load increased due to rapid update cadence; tuned signature refresh scheduling and confirmed bogus validation events remained low.

### On Call
- Shift: E. Romero
- Pages: 5
- Tickets: 11
- Status: Degraded during update storm; mitigations applied and transfer auth settings aligned.
